fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select 3 players. Learn what slots in the role list the 3 of them combined take up. (You are not told who has which slot).
- Select a slot in the role list, learn what role is occupying it.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are unaffected by frames.
- This may be rerolled for free if the host decides the role list is way too fucking stupid for this role.
- If the above is true and you kept it, your first ability will instead tell you the alignments. The second ability is unaffected.
